text:
@narendramodi Sir, who will TAKE CARE of INDIAN MIGRANTS & COVID-19 CRISIS in INDIA?

We have some SERIOUS QUESTIONS. 

WHEN is COVID-19 across INDIA gonna be CONTROLLED?

WHY is INDIAN ECONOMY estimated to get hit by > 10% CONTRACTION in FY 2020-21?
